metadata.title: 22. Natthipaccayo - Paṭṭhānuddesa dīpanīpāṭha - Leḍī sayāḍo gantha-saṅgaho - Anya

body.paragraph: Sabbo anantarapaccayo natthi paccayo nāma. Tathā vigata paccayo. Avigatapaccayopi atthipaccayena sabbasadiso. Atthītica avigatoti ca atthato ekameva. Tathā natthīti ca vigatotica. Natthivigataavigatapaccayadīpanā niṭṭhitā.
